Tools.name: query_balances
Tools.description: Query the balance of tokens for the current address

denom_list.description: List of token denominations to query (e.g., ['INJ', 'USDT']). If empty, returns all balances

Tools.name: transfer_funds
Tools.description: Transfer funds from current address to another Injective address

amount.description: Amount to transfer (as Decimal string to preserve precision)

Tools.name: query_spendable_balances
Tools.description: Query the spendable balance of tokens for the current address

denom_list.description: List of token denominations to query (e.g., ['INJ', 'USDT']). If empty, returns all spendable balances

Tools.name: query_total_supply
Tools.description: Query the total supply of tokens on the network

denom_list.description: List of token denominations to query (e.g., ['INJ', 'USDT']). If empty, returns total supply for all tokens

function.name: send_bid_auction
function.description: Sends a bid to the burn auction on behalf of the address

round.description: This specifies the round of the burn auction to participate in

amount.description: This specifies the amount to bid

function.name: fetch_auctions
function.description: This functions fetches all the historical burn auctions along with current burn auction

function.name: fetch_latest_auction
function.description: This function fetches the latest burn auction round

function.name: fetch_auction_bids
function.description: Fetches the bids for the particular auction round

bid_round.description: This specifies the round of the burn auction to participate in
